[one of a pair]

value: Medium: silk and wool Technique: plain compound twill on silk damask

label: Description
value: Rose satin with a pattern of circular beige medallions. Each medallion has a center of lilies and acanthus leaves surrounded by a wreath of imbricated leaves and rosettes. These, in turn, are encircled by another wreath of laurel leaves with daisies at intersection.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: silk, cotton Technique: compound satin weave

value: Gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane

label: Description
value: Hexagonal bowl with bowed sides. Outcurving rim and foot. Two molded handles. Decoration of flower garlands pendant from pearl-and-scroll border. Cover has rose-shaped knob handle and palmette decoration.

Design for a Woven or Embroidered Horizontal Border of the "Fabrique de St. Ruf"

label: Description
value: Top: Waved crest consisting of boughs with three seeds each and directed toward left. Five repeats are shown. Center: Waved crest, consisting of boughs with a seed and a leaf each and directed toward right. Six repeats are shown. Bottom: Arched crest with a seed between two leaves upon each point and with a seed motif in the wedges. Four repeats are shown.
